title: Panbil Industrial Park
subtitle: WWTP Expansion
description: Capacity expansion project utilizing MBR & MBBR systems for industrial wastewater management.
fullDescription: PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia successfully completed the WWTP (Waste Water Treatment Plant) expansion project at Panbil Industrial Park. This project involved upgrading the existing facility to handle increased industrial wastewater capacity from the growing number of tenants in the industrial estate.
scope: Design and engineering of expanded WWTP capacity
Implementation of MBBR (Moving Bed Biofilm Reactor) technology
Piping and civil works for new treatment tanks
